name: Let’s Do This
content: You came a long way to be with us
You pay good money to see a show
I rode all night on a big old bus
我要打开音响 我要让大家兴奋
我要让你们知道我由什么制成
I know just what you came here for
我知道只是为了你来这里
And I want to hear you scream and more
我想听到你尽情地喊叫
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
And the real party starts backstage
I wish you all could come along
我要打开音响 我要让大家兴奋
我要让你们知道我由什么制成
I know just what you came here for
我知道只是为了你来这里
And I want to hear you scream and more
我想听到你尽情地喊叫
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
Now's the time to get loud
And let me hear you shout it out
让我听到你大声说出来
Let me see you jumpin' up and down
Let me hear the words you know
你知道让我听到这句话
You know I'll sing them now
你知道我现在就给他们唱歌
This is what it's all about
Let me hear the hook now
我要打开音响 我要让大家兴奋
我要让你们知道我由什么制成
I know just what you came here for
我知道只是为了你来这里
And I want to hear you scream and more
我想听到你尽情地喊叫
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
Na na na na na na
